name: Dalek Invasion
description:
I'm  massive nerd, so I made the 2D platformer modifications Doctor Who themed. I arranged music, drew new art (basically everything; the only thing I didn't really change were the metal tiles and acid (re-colored and added textures) and the moving platforms), and updated two levels. The music took me the longest, because my ears are bad, so I did look up some sheet music to figure out key signatures and tempos. 

I arranged two pieces: the Doctor Who Main Theme and Geronimo (but it's actually called I Am the Doctor in the show's actual OST). The first one shows up in the Main Menu and in Level One, and the second one shows up in level 2.

I used this website to arrange the music. 

I used this website to make the art.

(plz don't sue me bbc, this is free and i spent two weeks on it)
